title: 293. Q&AF: Showing Grace, Mindset Shift For Employees & Overcoming Frustrations With #75HARD
itunes:title: 293. Q&AF: Showing Grace, Mindset Shift For Employees & Overcoming Frustrations With #75HARD
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on why it's important to reconcile & show grace to people with contrasting views, the best way to initiate a positive mindset shift in your employees, and how to channel your frustrations towards society while doing #75HARD.
